profile.name: Vineet Joshi
profile.title: Senior Software Engineer | Data Architect | Cloud Migration Specialist
profile.description: Highly accomplished and results-oriented Senior Software Engineer with 20+ years of experience delivering cutting-edge software solutions and leading digital transformations for Tier-1 clients across Australia, the UK, and APAC. Proven ability to collaborate effectively with clients and stakeholders, build high-performing teams, and deliver innovative solutions within demanding timelines. Expertise encompasses the entire software development lifecycle (SDLC), from requirements gathering and design to development, testing, and deployment, leveraging leading technologies including React, React Native, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, and cloud platforms like AWS and Azure. Adept at troubleshooting and debugging applications, ensuring seamless integration and optimal performance.  Passionate about leveraging technology to solve complex business problems and drive exceptional customer value. Proven success in building new technology capabilities, establishing vendor partnerships, and scaling delivery teams for mid-to-large-size projects.  Adept at Agile methodologies and technical documentation.  A collaborative and supportive team player committed to continuous learning and staying updated with the latest industry trends.  Seeking a challenging Software Engineer role where I can leverage my extensive experience and expertise to contribute to the immediate success of a dynamic and innovative organization.
profile.description2: A strategic thinker and problem-solver with a proven track record of delivering significant ROI for clients.  My expertise in data architecture, cloud migration, and digital transformation initiatives has resulted in substantial business improvements and cost savings.  I am proficient in facilitating workshops, providing technical leadership to onshore and offshore teams, and delivering projects within regulatory timeframes and budget constraints.  My experience includes successful cloud migrations, data architecture design, and digital transformation initiatives resulting in significant business improvements and cost savings for clients.  Ready to immediately contribute to a challenging and rewarding role, leveraging my deep technical skills and leadership experience to drive innovation and achieve ambitious business goals.  This is an opportunity to acquire a highly sought-after talent with a proven track record of success – don't miss out!

qualifications: Master of Computer Applications (1994-1997) – Birla Institute of Technology, India
Bachelor of Science (Electronics) (1991-1994) – Hislop College, University of Nagpur, India
keyAchievements: Delivered a fully cloud-native digital business for Angle Auto Finance within 6 months, achieving $1B in wholesale and retail business within 3 months of go-live.  This involved designing and implementing a robust data architecture, migrating legacy systems to the cloud, and scaling the delivery team to meet aggressive deadlines.

Successfully migrated a $1B loan book from Westpac, achieving 99.99% reconciliation with a $23 variance, integrating data from 23,000 auto dealers. This project required meticulous data management, robust testing procedures, and seamless integration with multiple systems.

Built a Data Warehouse (DWH) with 261 tables, 165 million rows, and 325 GB of data in 3 months, producing 70 critical compliance and accounting reports, ingesting ~$300 million AUD in invoices from 40 OEMs in the first month. This involved designing and implementing a scalable and efficient data warehouse solution, ensuring data quality and accuracy.

experience.title: Data Management Lead - Accenture (Suncorp)
responsibilities: Executed data architecture and data migration for the Digital Insurer Transformation Program, replacing a legacy system with a cloud-native solution on Azure.
Established data stream governance and defined key delivery artifacts for the program.
Upskilled and scaled the delivery team in Duck Creek, Snowflake, and Power BI technologies.
Defined the roadmap for policy migration to the Duck Creek Insurance Platform, ensuring a smooth transition.

fullExperience.title: Data Management Lead - Accenture (Suncorp)
responsibilities: Executed data architecture and data migration for the Digital Insurer Transformation Program replacing legacy policy administration system with Duck Creek cloud-native system on Azure.
Established governance for the data stream and defined key delivery artifacts, ensuring compliance and efficiency.
Upskilled and scaled the delivery team with Duck Creek (Policy, Billing, Clarity), Snowflake, and Power BI, improving team capabilities and project velocity.
Contributed to Enterprise Data Modeling and defined the roadmap for policy migration, providing strategic direction and planning.
Facilitated workshops on data integration impact, ensuring stakeholder alignment and buy-in.
Provided delivery leadership to onshore and offshore staff, fostering collaboration and effective communication.

fullExperience.title: Lead Consultant – AWS Migration Assessment - Accenture (Westpac BT)
responsibilities: Led the feasibility assessment to migrate and scale the on-prem wealth management platform (BT Panorama) to AWS IaaS for Westpac BT.
Led a team of consultants to assess the existing application and infrastructure stack, identifying potential challenges and opportunities.
Created a proof of concept to size appropriate cloud infrastructure, demonstrating the feasibility and cost-effectiveness of the migration.
Managed benchmark tests and authored the feasibility report presented to executive leadership, securing buy-in for the project.
Successfully identified and mitigated potential risks associated with the cloud migration, ensuring a smooth transition.

fullExperience.title: Program Manager – Platform Build and Scale - Accenture (Cerberus Capital)
responsibilities: Led the build and enablement of a Loan Origination System using FIS Ambit on Azure in 9 months, delivering a critical business capability on time and within budget.
Delivered the program within regulatory timeframes, managing ~50 resources and fostering a collaborative and high-performing team environment.
Managed stakeholder communication and reporting to the CXO level, ensuring transparency and alignment.
Provided technical leadership for data integration with third parties (Credit Bureaus, OEMs, etc.), ensuring seamless data flow and accuracy.
Built and integrated ~60+ documents for business operations, streamlining processes and improving efficiency.
Built a DWH with 261 tables, 165 million rows, and 325 GB of data, producing 70 reports to support critical business decisions.

fullExperience.title: Program Manager – Analytics and Data Management, Data Integration - Accenture (BHP)
responsibilities: Led sales activities, including contract negotiation, delivering ~$8 million AUD in pipeline, expanding business opportunities and revenue streams.
Established the Program Acceleration Office and led program planning and execution, improving project efficiency and delivery.
Led multiple streams for Data Integration, Infrastructure Uplift, Application Migration, and Platform Stabilization, demonstrating versatility and leadership.
Managed a multi-vendor environment and ramped up the offshore delivery team, fostering collaboration and knowledge sharing.
Conducted technology selection, prioritization, team staffing, and infrastructure uplift, optimizing resource allocation and project success.
Optimized resources and performed data sensitivity analysis with cybersecurity sign-off, ensuring data security and compliance.

fullExperience.title: Senior Manager - Sales - Accenture (Financial Services)
responsibilities: Led and closed deals ranging from $2M - $15M, consistently exceeding sales targets and contributing significantly to revenue growth.
Drove Accenture's value proposition in Cloud, Analytics, and DevOps, showcasing expertise and market knowledge.
Developed and grew long-term key client relationships, building trust and fostering strong partnerships.
Supported technology solutioning and estimating in proposals and pricing, ensuring accurate and competitive bids.
Managed successful opportunity transitions to delivery teams, ensuring a smooth handover and project success.
Complied with Accenture sales methodology and maintained sales pipeline accuracy, demonstrating professionalism and adherence to standards.
